https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null The portrait of a woman who, after her husbandâ€™s death, travels to the holy city of Banares in order to live out her days and achieve moksha, the final release from the cycle of birth, death, and reincarnation. The ghats, a set of stairs leading down to the Ganges River, are the site of religious ceremonies. Being cremated here ensures an end to samsara. At the Stairs
